image_generation_prompt: A @woman is wearing a light green @kurta, white palazzo pants, and no visible accessories. The @woman stands confidently on a curved road with a white line marking, surrounded by a backdrop of trees and a white building with visible air conditioning units. She is looking slightly to the side with a gentle smile, her hair cascading down her shoulders. The scene is serene, with scattered dry leaves on the ground, adding a touch of autumnal charm.
